title: Prepositions of Place: in, on, at, under
description: Слушайте и определяйте, где находятся предметы и люди.

tasks.audioText: A woman is looking for her keys. She checks everywhere. The keys are on the table.
tasks.transcript: The keys are on the table.

options.text: The keys are under the table.
The keys are on top of the table.
The keys are next to the table.
The keys are behind the table.

tasks.explanation: 'On the table' means on top of the surface. Option 2 says the same thing.

tasks.audioText: A boy comes home from school. He puts his things away. My bag is in the closet.
tasks.transcript: My bag is in the closet.

options.text: The bag is inside the closet.
The bag is on the closet.
The bag is behind the closet.
The bag is under the closet.

tasks.explanation: 'In the closet' means inside. Option 1 is correct.

tasks.audioText: A girl looks for her cat. She searches the whole house. The cat is under the bed.
tasks.transcript: The cat is under the bed.

options.text: The cat is on the bed.
The cat is next to the bed.
The cat is below the bed.
The cat is behind the door.

tasks.explanation: 'Under the bed' means below it. Option 3 uses 'below,' which is the same meaning.

tasks.audioText: Two friends meet in the city. They are near a big building. I will wait for you at the entrance.
tasks.transcript: I will wait for you at the entrance.

options.text: He will wait inside the building.
He will wait at the entrance of the building.
He will wait behind the building.
He will wait on the roof.

tasks.explanation: 'At the entrance' means at a specific point — the entrance. Option 2 is correct.

tasks.audioText: A teacher arranges the classroom. She puts desks in rows. The bookshelf is next to the door.
tasks.transcript: The bookshelf is next to the door.

options.text: The bookshelf is far from the door.
The bookshelf is behind the door.
The bookshelf is beside the door.
The bookshelf is above the door.

tasks.explanation: 'Next to' means beside, right near something. Option 3 says the same thing.

tasks.audioText: A man describes his office. It is a small room. The lamp is between the computer and the phone.
tasks.transcript: The lamp is between the computer and the phone.

options.text: The lamp is in the middle of the computer and phone.
The lamp is behind the computer.
The lamp is under the phone.
The lamp is on top of the computer.

tasks.explanation: 'Between' means in the middle of two things. Option 1 is correct.

tasks.audioText: A woman parks her car. She looks around the parking lot. My car is behind the supermarket.
tasks.transcript: My car is behind the supermarket.

options.text: The car is in front of the supermarket.
The car is inside the supermarket.
The car is at the back of the supermarket.
The car is on top of the supermarket.

tasks.explanation: 'Behind the supermarket' means at the back. Option 3 is correct.

tasks.audioText: A boy sits in the garden. He reads a book. The dog is in front of me.
tasks.transcript: The dog is in front of me.

options.text: The dog is behind the boy.
The dog is facing the boy, ahead of him.
The dog is next to the boy.
The dog is far from the boy.

tasks.explanation: 'In front of me' means ahead, facing the speaker. Option 2 is correct.

tasks.audioText: A girl describes her bedroom. It is cozy and warm. There is a picture on the wall.
tasks.transcript: There is a picture on the wall.

options.text: A picture hangs on the wall.
A picture is on the floor.
A picture is on the desk.
A picture is in the drawer.

tasks.explanation: 'On the wall' means attached to or hanging on the wall surface. Option 1 is correct.

tasks.audioText: A man waits for his friend at the park. He sits on a bench. The fountain is in front of the bench.
tasks.transcript: The fountain is in front of the bench.

options.text: The fountain is behind the bench.
The fountain is under the bench.
The fountain is ahead of the bench.
The fountain is far from the bench.

tasks.explanation: 'In front of' means ahead, facing the bench. Option 3 says the same.

tasks.audioText: A woman works at a hospital. She tells a visitor where to go. The pharmacy is on the first floor.
tasks.transcript: The pharmacy is on the first floor.

options.text: The pharmacy is on the second floor.
The pharmacy is on the ground floor.
The pharmacy is in the basement.
The pharmacy is outside the hospital.

tasks.explanation: 'On the first floor' — the first floor is the ground level. Option 2 is correct.

tasks.audioText: A boy plays hide and seek with friends. He finds a good spot. I am behind the big tree.
tasks.transcript: I am behind the big tree.

options.text: The boy is hiding at the back of the tree.
The boy is hiding in the tree.
The boy is hiding under the tree.
The boy is standing next to the tree.

tasks.explanation: 'Behind the big tree' means at the back of the tree, hidden from view. Option 1.

tasks.audioText: A woman tells a tourist about the town. She points across the road. The bank is between the cafe and the library.
tasks.transcript: The bank is between the cafe and the library.

options.text: The bank is next to the library only.
The bank is in the middle of the cafe and library.
The bank is behind the cafe.
The bank is across from the library.

tasks.explanation: 'Between the cafe and the library' means in the middle of both. Option 2 is correct.

tasks.audioText: A man checks into a hotel. The receptionist gives him directions. Your room is at the end of the hall.
tasks.transcript: Your room is at the end of the hall.

options.text: The room is at the beginning of the hall.
The room is in the middle of the hall.
The room is at the far end of the hall.
The room is on the next floor.

tasks.explanation: 'At the end of the hall' means at the far end. Option 3 is correct.

tasks.audioText: A girl looks under her desk at school. She dropped something. My eraser is under the chair.
tasks.transcript: My eraser is under the chair.

options.text: The eraser is on the chair.
The eraser is in the bag.
The eraser is next to the chair.
The eraser is below the chair.

tasks.explanation: 'Under the chair' means below it, on the floor beneath. Option 4 says the same.

short_description: Тренируйте понимание предлогов места на слух.
